DOC.HEADLINE: Ceiling collapse at construction site kills one, traps three in east China

TEXT.P: One worker was confirmed dead, and rescuers were still searching for three others trapped, after a workshop ceiling under construction collapsed Friday in east China's Nantong City.
Rescuers said they saved four injured workers and sent them to hospital.
The accident happened at 5:50 a.m. at the heavy-machinery workshop of the Nantong subsidiary of the China International Marine Containers (Group) Ltd.
